Raspberry Bush

building a cluster of raspberry pis

background software hardware step-by-step performance

Electronics

  • Hi Ben
  • Raspberry Pi
  • DLink Switch
  • SD Cards (class 10, etc.)
  • Labeler (very important)

Cabling

  • Ethernet
  • USB Cords for Power

Case and Mounting

  • Sheet of Acrylic
  • Fans
  • Bolts, standoffs, spacers

Power

  • USB Power Hubs
